articles.title: Massive twist in ugly cricket controversy
articles.description: The Boxing Day Test has been won by Australia in a thrilling finish on day four, but a crucial moment soured the game for Pakistan as the tourists crept towards a historic victory.
articles.content:

articles.title: BBL cricket star convicted of rape
articles.description: Nepali cricket star Sandeep Lamichhane was on Friday convicted of rape after a repeatedly delayed trial that had left him free to continue his sporting career.
articles.content:
